scripts.stag-bump-Version: mode=staging yarn release --release as minor && git push --follow-tags
scripts.stag-build-android: mode=staging build=android yarn release --skip.tag && mode=staging expo build:android --release-channel staging
scripts.stag-build-ios: mode=staging build=ios yarn release --skip.tag && mode=staging expo build:ios --release-channel staging
scripts.stag-publish: mode=staging yarn release --skip.tag && mode=staging expo publish --release-channel staging
scripts.prod-bump-Version: mode=production yarn release --release as minor && git push --follow-tags
scripts.prod-build-android: mode=production build=android yarn release --skip.tag && mode=production expo build:android --release-channel production
scripts.prod-build-ios: mode=production build=ios yarn release --skip.tag && mode=production expo build:ios --release-channel production
scripts.prod-publish: mode=production yarn release && git push --follow-tags && mode=production expo publish --release-channel production
